__e: You're wrong - the Juliette isn't a boat, it's a rose!

Uh, well, no, but listen, doesn't it seem strange that the only thing Juliette doesn't remember is you?

Her daughter Juliette is here to speak on her mother's behalf.
"I have no idea where Juliette is... no one's heard from her in God knows how long"?

- Hmm. Okay, so you think that if I go, you'll just become Mr. Juliette Barnes, is that right?
